TITLE: Scheduling Task - Java
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to schedule a task using the TaskScheduler. It uses a lambda expression to define the task to be executed, and Bukkit.broadcastMessage() to send a message to all players when the task runs.
SOURCE: https://github.com/anon8281/universalscheduler/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: java
CODE:
```
Main.getScheduler().runTaskLater(() -> { //Main there is your plugin Main
        Bukkit.broadcastMessage("Wow, it was scheduled");
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Scheduling and getting task - Java
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to schedule a task and obtain a MyScheduledTask instance. Includes a lambda expression defining the task, and a delay of 10 ticks (10L).
SOURCE: https://github.com/anon8281/universalscheduler/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: java
CODE:
```
MyScheduledTask task = Main.getScheduler().runTaskLater(() -> { //Main there is your plugin Main
        Bukkit.broadcastMessage("Wow, it was scheduled");
}, 10L);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Getting TaskScheduler instance - Java
DESCRIPTION: Provides a static getter method to access the TaskScheduler instance. This allows other parts of the plugin to easily access the scheduler for scheduling tasks.
SOURCE: https://github.com/anon8281/universalscheduler/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: java
CODE:
```
public static TaskScheduler getScheduler() {
        return scheduler;
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing TaskScheduler - Java
DESCRIPTION: Initializes the TaskScheduler in the plugin's onEnable() method. It retrieves the scheduler instance using UniversalScheduler.getScheduler(this), where 'this' refers to the plugin instance.
SOURCE: https://github.com/anon8281/universalscheduler/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: java
CODE:
```
@Override
public void onEnable() {
        //if your already have onEnable() just add next line to it
        scheduler = UniversalScheduler.getScheduler(this);
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Declaring TaskScheduler field - Java
DESCRIPTION: Declares a static TaskScheduler field in the plugin's main class. This field will hold the instance of the scheduler used throughout the plugin.
SOURCE: https://github.com/anon8281/universalscheduler/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: java
CODE:
```
private static TaskScheduler scheduler;
```

TITLE: Maven Dependency - XML
DESCRIPTION: Defines the Maven dependency for the UniversalScheduler library. Specifies the groupId, artifactId, version, and scope for the dependency.
SOURCE: https://github.com/anon8281/universalscheduler/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: xml
CODE:
```
<dependency>
    <groupId>com.github.Anon8281</groupId>
    <artifactId>UniversalScheduler</artifactId>
    <version>[VERSION]</version>
    <scope>compile</scope>
</dependency>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Maven Repository Configuration - XML
DESCRIPTION: Configures the Maven repository to include JitPack, which hosts the UniversalScheduler library. This allows Maven to resolve the dependency when building the plugin.
SOURCE: https://github.com/anon8281/universalscheduler/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: xml
CODE:
```
<repository>
    <id>jitpack.io</id>
    <url>https://jitpack.io</url>
</repository>
```

TITLE: Gradle Dependency - Groovy
DESCRIPTION: Defines the Gradle dependency for the UniversalScheduler library.  Specifies the group, name, and version of the dependency.
SOURCE: https://github.com/anon8281/universalscheduler/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: groovy
CODE:
```
dependencies {
    //...
    implementation 'com.github.Anon8281:UniversalScheduler:[VERSION]'
}
```

TITLE: Gradle Repository Configuration - Groovy
DESCRIPTION: Configures the Gradle repository to include JitPack.  This allows Gradle to resolve the dependency when building the plugin.
SOURCE: https://github.com/anon8281/universalscheduler/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: groovy
CODE:
```
repositories {
    //...
    maven { url 'https://jitpack.io' }
}
```

TITLE: Maven Shade Plugin Configuration - XML
DESCRIPTION: Configures the Maven Shade plugin to relocate the UniversalScheduler library's package. This prevents conflicts with other plugins that may use the same library.  The [YOUR_PLUGIN_PACKAGE] needs to be replaced with the actual package of your plugin.
SOURCE: https://github.com/anon8281/universalscheduler/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: xml
CODE:
```
<plugins>
    <plugin>
        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>maven-shade-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>3.5.0</version>
        <executions>
            <execution>
                <phase>package</phase>
                <goals>
                    <goal>shade</goal>
                </goals>
                <configuration>
                    <artifactSet>
                        <includes>
                            <include>com.github.Anon8281:UniversalScheduler</include>
                        </includes>
                    </artifactSet>
                    <relocations>
                        <relocation>
                            <pattern>com.github.Anon8281.universalScheduler</pattern>
                            <!-- Don't forget to replace -->
                            <shadedPattern>[YOUR_PLUGIN_PACKAGE].universalScheduler</shadedPattern>
                        </relocation>
                    </relocations>
                </configuration>
            </execution>
        </executions>
    </plugin>
</plugins>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Gradle ShadowJar Task Configuration - Groovy
DESCRIPTION: Configures the Gradle ShadowJar task to relocate the UniversalScheduler library's package during the build process. This is done to prevent class conflicts with other plugins that might also use the same library. The [YOUR_PLUGIN_PACKAGE] needs to be replaced with the actual package of your plugin.
SOURCE: https://github.com/anon8281/universalscheduler/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: groovy
CODE:
```
shadowJar {
    //Don't forget to replace
    relocate 'com.github.Anon8281.universalScheduler', '[YOUR_PLUGIN_PACKAGE].universalScheduler' 
}
```
